评论详情: Much more than expected. Great Fabric. Looks very expensive and classy. Many compliments. Can dress up or down. Very comfortable. Top was a bit big on me. To remove wrinkles, just pop in the dryer with a damp cloth for a bit. Very stunning set. LOVE IT!

This set is amazing! I was looking for something comfortable but put-together to wear for the holidays, this outfit was the perfect choice! It's a nice heavy material and keeps it's shape very well. Treat yourself to this set, you won't regret it :)

评论概述: So far, so good. Beautiful quality, soft.
评论详情: I am 5'4", and about 140 pounds. I have that menopausal spare tire around my tummy. I found that even the Apricot color was perfectly concealed. But if you are any heavier, this isn't the outfit for you.  It is a surprisingly good quality for the price. The material is soft, warm, and suitable for fall. I won't buy polyester/rayon clothing as I can't stand how it feels on my body. But if it's blended with pure cotton, Viscose, Tencel, or Modal, then it's a game changer. Of course, I'd prefer not to have a blend at all, but I'd also prefer a reality TV star's bank account.  One downside is the lack of pockets due to the lower price, but overall, I find the outfit lovely. I have not yet worn or washed them, I plan to update this review once I do.  While I prefer to support my country's manufacturing, I support free trade! If purchasing a better product for a lower price is made elsewhere that fits within my budget, I am happy and grateful for the ability to buy it.
Great color and quality
